entry_requirements_raw.Degree: -A Bachelor ‘s Degree with minimum CGPA of 2.50 or equivalent, as accepted by SAITO UC Senate; or -A Bachelor ‘s Degree or equivalent not meeting CGPA of 2.50 can be accepted subject to a minimum of 5 years working experience in relevant field. -Any other equivalent qualification recognized by the Malaysia government; or recognition of prior learning as approved by Ministry of Higher Education. Candidate must pass APEL (Accreditation of Prior Experiential Learning) assessment criteria; Minimum age of 30 years old and possess STPM/Diploma/A-Level/ equivalent with relevant work experience..

Degree.text: -A Bachelor ‘s Degree with minimum CGPA of 2.50 or equivalent, as accepted by SAITO UC Senate; or -A Bachelor ‘s Degree or equivalent not meeting CGPA of 2.50 can be accepted subject to a minimum of 5 years working experience in relevant field. -Any other equivalent qualification recognized by the Malaysia government; or recognition of prior learning as approved by Ministry of Higher Education. Candidate must pass APEL (Accreditation of Prior Experiential Learning) assessment criteria; Minimum age of 30 years old and possess STPM/Diploma/A-Level/ equivalent with relevant work experience..
